<b>I&#39;m on a Boat! 2nd Edition</b><br /><br />I’m on a boat! was my first ever Adventure PDF, and as popular as it’s been I knew it could do with a fresh lick of paint.<br /><br />So the design has been updated (in a format that should be familiar to my Patreon followers) and I&#39;ve expanded on the original content with more creatures, more loot and more maps. If you&#39;ve already bought the PDF from DTRPG then enjoy this free update. If not, now&#39;s a great time to pick it up!


Attachment:

<a href='http://rpg.drivethrustuff.com/product/116150/Im-On-A-Boat-A-Dungeon-World-Adventure'>I'm On A Boat! 2nd Edition (A Dungeon World Adventure) - Joe Banner | DriveThruRPG.com</a>

        <p>Hi, Mr. Banner, what&#39;s up?<br />I&#39;m Marcos, I live in Brazil and I&#39;m part of a website called Torre do Mago. Our site has been dedicated to making content of RPG and to offer free in our community. Unfortunately, the Brazilian public is still limited in their understanding of foreign languages, so we&#39;ve translated a lot of content and would very much like to request your permission to translate I&#39;m on a Boat! 2nd edition.<br /><br />We would like to translate, to refer, using the same layout and make ir available for free in our website.<br /><br />Thank U so much for the cool content you have made, we love it!</p>
</div>
